title: Tour de France Power: The numbers behind Vingegaard’s TT and Sepp Kuss on the Col de la Loze
content:
Literally no one expected Vingegaard to beat Tadej Pogačar by one minute and 38 seconds in stage 16’s time trial.

Read the full article at Tour de France Power: The numbers behind Vingegaard’s TT and Sepp Kuss on the Col de la Loze on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
